    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlProducer

        public XmlProducer(java.io.OutputStreamWriter osr)
        Creates a new instance of XMLProducer. With a minified XML configured.
        Parameters:
        osr - the underlying output stream to be written

      • XmlProducer

        public XmlProducer(java.io.OutputStreamWriter osr,
                   boolean minified)
        Creates a new instance of XMLProducer.
        Parameters:
        osr - the underlying output stream to be written
        minified - when false produces a human readable XML, other wise outputs a clean strait line
